author: stsp
msg: * STATUS: Add r1330431 to r1330410 group.

author: jbonofre
msg: [KARAF-1397] Cellar commands now check if a cluster group exists.

author: stsp
msg: Follow up to r1330410 and r1330424, fix potential file handle leaks.
(run_hook_cmd): Don't use the SVN_ERR() macro -- avoid an early return
that might leak file handles we're trying to close. And always try to
close the null_handle regardless of the status of 'err'.
